mapper.select: SELECT A.HSPT_NO, A.WR_RNO, A.BED_NO, A.PA_NAME, A.HSPT_YN, A.TRM_CD , B.DISEASE_CD, B.ICD_NAME FROM V_HOSP A LEFT OUTER JOIN DIAGNOSIS_HISTORY B ON A.TRM_CD = B.TRM_CD AND A.DISEASE_CD = B.DISEASE_CD WHERE HSPT_YN='Y'

SELECT A.HSPT_NO, A.EMP_NM, TO_CHAR(A.HSPT_IN_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS HSPT_IN_DT, A.MEDI_RECORD , B.PA_NO, B.PA_NAME, B.PA_REG, B.PA_HP FROM V_HOSP_DIA A INNER JOIN PATIENT B ON A.PA_NO =B.PA_NO WHERE HSPT_NO = #{hsptNo}

SELECT A.NREC_NO ,A.NREC_CONT ,TO_CHAR(A.NREC_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS NREC_DATE ,A.EMP_NO ,A.PA_NO ,A.HSPT_NO , B.PA_NAME , C.EMP_NM FROM NURSING_RECORD A INNER JOIN PATIENT B ON A.PA_NO = B.PA_NO INNER JOIN EMPLOYEE C ON A.EMP_NO = C.EMP_NO WHERE A.HSPT_NO = #{hsptNo} ORDER BY 1

SELECT A.EMP_NM, A.PA_NAME, A.HSPT_NO , B.VT_NO, B.VT_TMP, B.VT_PLS, B.VT_BP, B.VT_RP, B.VT_NE, TO_CHAR(B.VT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS VT_DATE FROM V_HOSP A INNER JOIN VITAL B ON A.HSPT_NO = B.HSPT_NO WHERE A.HSPT_NO = #{hsptNo} ORDER BY B.VT_NO

SELECT A.HSPT_NO , TO_CHAR(A.IO_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS IO_DATE, A.IO_TOTAL , B.INTAKE_NO, B.EMP_NO, B.INTAKE_CAPA, B.INTAKE_CATE_CD, B.INTAKE_NE , C.OUTPUT_NO, C.EMP_NO, C.OUTPUT_CAPA, C.OUTPUT_CATE_CD, C.OUTPUT_NE , D.INTAKE_CATE_NM , E.OUTPUT_CATE_NM FROM INTAKE_OUTPUT A LEFT OUTER JOIN INTAKE B ON A.HSPT_NO = B.HSPT_NO AND A.IO_DATE = B.IO_DATE LEFT OUTER JOIN OUTPUT C ON A.HSPT_NO = C.HSPT_NO AND A.IO_DATE = C.IO_DATE LEFT OUTER JOIN INTAKE_CATEGORY D ON B.INTAKE_CATE_CD = D.INTAKE_CATE_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN OUTPUT_CATEGORY E ON C.OUTPUT_CATE_CD = E.OUTPUT_CATE_CD WHERE A.HSPT_NO = #{hsptNo} ORDER BY IO_DATE

/* WardDAO.selectOutputCategory */
SELECT output_cate_cd, output_cate_nm FROM output_category
